purpose: Give a general instruction about the bin packing.

prompt.content: During packing the objects, I want to follow several rules. First, put a fragile object on top of a soft object to prevent breaking the fragile object.
Second, a flexible object is preferred to be folded to make it compact to secure spaces for other objects.
Third, a rigid object should not be pressed hard.
Fourth, a deformable object can be pressed if possible.
